# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. It's worth more than $150 to us and we believe it holds significant value for you as well. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $175? 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $175. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $175
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
